resources.string: This is the standard way to play the game. Create a team of four heroes to face off against an adversary of your choosing.

This is the advanced way to play the game. Like the standard mode, create a team of four heroes to fight with. The difference is you will face all the bosses in sequential order. No breaks allowed. [Still in Development]
This is an alternate way to play the game. Choose one of the four villainous foes to control and face off against the heroes. [Coming Soon]

Class: Emperor 
 Role: Defender 

 The wise rulers of nations 
 and charismatic warriors 
 who fight for what they 
 believe in. These heroes 
 protect and embolden their 
 comrades to survive even 
 the harshest battles. 

 Recommended for 
 Beginners

Class: Saint 
 Role: Healer 

 Maidens blessed by the 
 higher powers who fight for 
 justice. Compassionate and 
 gentle with their allies while 
 harsh to those deemed evil. 
 Absorb dark energy from 
 enemies and convert it into 
 healing for the team. 

 Recommended for All

Class: Enchantress 
 Role: Support 

 Serene dancers that 
 channel the power of rituals 
 and the Arcana in a 
 spectacle performance. 
 These mystics reveal their 
 cards to cause various 
 effects or dance to tap into 
 celestial powers. 

 Recommended for All

Class: Sage 
 Role: Attacker 

 Scholars who have poured 
 over hundreds of tomes 
 in pursuit of magic. These 
 clever sorcerers have 
 mastered all fields of magic 
 both natural and forbidden. 
 Cast lower level spells to 
 mix them into stronger 
 devastating calamities. 

 Recommended for 
 Beginners

Class: Pirate 
 Role: Attacker 

 Masters of the sea that 
 carry their own honor code. 
 "Anything goes when fighting 
 traitors, monsters, and other 
 pirates". These rough and 
 tumble swashbucklers get 
 things done by damaging 
 weakened foes. 

\ Recommended for Experts
Miss Lead - Matriarch of the O Men
Ruhtra - Fallen King of the Round

The shunned Sister of the Grand Temple. Because she turned her back on the faith they cursed her to this appearance. Not very powerful as a sister but after her transformation she managed to become something of a threat.

A deranged cult leader who created her following by kidnapping children and raising them as her own. Once she was a respectable mage, but the loss of her son caused her to go mad. Her mastery of magic and illusions have led to the fall of the many who challenged her.

Once the King and leader of his order of knights, Arthur was an honorable person. Due to conspiracy and a coup his entire Kingdom fell into ruin and all his men executed. His spirit lingered and had taken the name Ruhtra seeking to pull unfortunate souls to the depths of his forlorn castle.

The Demon King that had dropped the world into an endless darkness. A ruthless and cunning monster who clawed his way to the top on his own merits. Extremely dangerous and only who have been blessed have challenged him.
Swing down on a foe with the equipped weapon.
Show your compassionate side. Take damage in place of an ally. \n\nCost: 7 MP
Lead by example by striking the enemy first. Increases aggro and deals physical damage. \n\nCost: 12 MP
Command your troops to take a defensive formation. Increases all allies physical defense. \n\nCost: 15 MP
Assure your soldiers that backup is on the way. Increases all allies magical defense. \n\nCost: 15 MP
Let out a battle cry to regain control of your own body. The resounding shockwave strikes fear into the enemy. Attempt to apply current ailment to the enemy while removing your own. \n\nCost: 30 MP
Make a powerful swing with reckless abandon. Deals physical damage to the enemy while also damaging yourself. \n\nCost: 7 MP
Unite your troops to cover their fellow man. Greatly increase all allies defenses but lower all offenses. \n\nCost: 19 MP
Rally your soldiers with words of glory and honor. Remind them of what they fight for. Makes all allies impervious to enemy attacks and ailments. \n\nThis skill can only be used once per battle.
Calls upon the sacred beings to dish out punishment. Deals hybrid damage to drain the enemy of their health. \n\nCost: 7 MP
Share what you have with your comrades. Give a percentage of your current health to all allies. \n\nCost: 3% HP
Share blessed waters with those in need. Cures status ailments and/or revives an ally. \n\nCost: 28 MP
Calls upon the sacred powers for protection. Prevents an ally from being targeted. \n\nCost: 14 MP
Grants a blessing to all party members praying for them. Grants all allies regen. \n\nCost: 7 MP
Rings the holy bells to cleanse the body and soul. Removes 1 debuff from all allies. \n\nCost: 14 MP
A fervent prayer meant to receive the blessing of the heavens. Give a percentage of your current health to restore MP. \n\nCost: 60% HP
Channel the scared powers into you. Let your body become a vessel for the divine. Enhances all skills. \n\nThis skill can only be used once per battle.
A more potent form of Holy Smite which drains more energy. \n\nCost: 7 MP
A more potent form of Love thy Neighbor which heals more for less cost. \n\nCost: 5% HP
A more potent form of Holy Water which targets the whole party. \n\nCost: 28 MP
A more potent form of Divine Intervention which redirects all attacks to someone else. \n\nCost: 14 MP
A more potent form of Blessing which heals more health per turn. \n\nCost: 7 MP
A more potent form of Blessed Bells which removes 2 debuffs instead of 1. \n\nCost: 14 MP
A more potent form of Benediction which restores more MP. \n\nCost: 40% HP
Channel the scared powers into you. Let your body become a vessel for the divine. Enhances all skills.

Flip over the card depicting a gentle woman and a fierce lion. 
Upright: Raises the attack of all allies. 
Reversed: Lowers the enemy's attack. 

Cost: 20 MP

Flip over the card depicting a forlorn tower. 
Upright: Raises the defenses of all allies. 
Reversed: Lowers the enemy's defenses. 

Cost: 20 MP

Flip over the card depicting a gilded chariot. 
Upright: Raises the agility of all allies. 
Reversed: Lowers the enemy's agility. 

Cost: 20 MP

Flip over the card depicting the grim reaper. 
Upright: Applies a random ailment on the enemy. 
Reversed: Applies a random ailment on all allies. 

Cost: 50 MP
Flip over the card depicting the oblivious beggar. Activates the effect of a random Arcana. Current card selection applies. \n\nCost: 5 MP
Perform a sacred ritual to torment those with wicked intentions. Burns the enemy with great probability. \n\nCost: 13 MP

Perform an elegant dance to get inspirations from the stars. Gain insight on the next card is Upright or Reversed. 
Upright: Slightly heals all allies. 
Reversed: Deals magic damage to the enemy. 

Cost: 10 MP
Call out to those who would govern fate. Have them guide your readings. For a short duration, all cards will activate both effects. \n\nThis skill can only be used once per battle.
Conjure a fire pillar with potency nothing short of a volcanic eruption. Deals fire damage to the enemy and stores one Tier 1 Mark. \n\nCost: 15 MP
Cast a hail of ice blades reminiscent of a blizzard. Deals ice damage to the enemy and stores one Tier 1 Mark. \n\nCost: 15 MP
Summon a windstorm with the destructive force of a tornado. Deals wind damage to the enemy and stores one Tier 1 Mark. \n\nCost: 15 MP
Create an earthquake to shake and rumble with a fervor surpassing the Richter Scale. Deals earth damage to the enemy and stores one Tier 1 Mark. \n\nCost: 15 MP

Fuse both fire and wind to create a disaster sent down from the heavens. Deals light damage to the enemy and stores one Tier 2 and Tier 1 Mark.
Requires two Tier 1 Mark. 

Cost: 45 MP

Fuse both water and earth to create a disaster rising from the underworld. Deals dark damage to the enemy and stores one Tier 2 and Tier 1 Mark. 
Requires two Tier 1 Mark. 

Cost: 45 MP

Merge light and dark to create a catastrophe capable of leveling nations. Deals untyped magic damage to the enemy and stores one Tier 3 Mark. 
Requires two Tier 2 Mark. 

Cost: 75 MP

Do the forbidden. Merge with an alternate self to cast the ultimate magic. Deals almighty damage to the enemy. 
Requires one Tier 3 Mark. 

Cost: 100 MP
Shoots bullets coated in poison. Deals damage and poisons the enemy. \n\nCost: 4 MP
Aims for enemy weak points and shoots at them. Deals damage and attempts to lower the enemies physical defense. \n\nCost: 5 MP

Seeks injured points on the enemy and focuses on striking them. Deals damage to the enemy. Damage is increased if target suffers from ailments and/or debuffs. Damage is increased further if the target suffers from both. \n\nCost: 13 MP
Channels a gentle breeze to clear away dangers to your crew. Attempts to clear all buffs from the enemy. \n\nCost: 20 MP
Psyche yourself up with the promise of plunder. Greatly raise own attack while lowering defense. \n\nCost: 12 MP
Bounce a bullet of the surroundings to hit the enemy\'s spine. Deals damage and attempts to paralyze the enemy. \n\nCost: 7 MP
Swing your saber with enough force to split the sea. Greatly damages the enemy. \n\nCost: 19 MP

Your crew has committed mutiny and your rage must be sated. Blood must be spilled. Deals devastating damage by clearing all your buffs. Activate Vantage Slash for every buff lost. \n\nThis skill can only be used once per battle.
